channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Inflation well above Fed’s target at year-end, PCE data show. Rate cuts on hold.
How EA’s $5 billion Sims empire has become a magnet for female talent in a male-dominated field
item.description: As The Sims turns 25, the women-led team reflects on how they helped build one of the best-selling games of all time.

item.title: American workers’ wage and benefit gains accelerated late last year
JetBlue’s $499 gamble: A new travel credit card that promises mile-high perks for a sky-high price
item.description: Here’s everything you need to know about the JetBlue Premier World Elite Mastercard premium travel credit card.

item.title: Demand in New York for physical gold has been ‘incredible.’ Here’s why.
‘Bond King’ Bill Gross bought a ‘BONDS 1’ license plate to impress his boss—but dumped it when people kept asking him to bail people out of jail
item.description: Gross said the private plate debacle taught him one of the most important lessons of his career.

item.title: U.S. consumer spending capped a strong 2024 by surging in December
JPMorgan’s internal tool shows many offices aren’t ready for the unpopular return to office mandate
item.description: JPMorgan Chase’s Polaris location not yet available for returning workers

item.title: New pain drug, Vertex’s Journavx, gets FDA approval as safer alternative to addictive opioids
item.description: Each year, about 125 million opioid prescriptions are written for Americans with pain caused by broken bones, burns, surgeries, and other injuries and...

item.title: Investors should be wary of the ‘most admired’ companies, writes Mark Hulbert
